negotiation_message:
Alice said in round 1: Hi Lingyao, based on the items and values, I propose the following deal:
I get the 2 balls, which have a total value of 8 to me. 
You get the 1 book and 3 hats.
This maximizes my value while still being fair to you. The deal is pareto optimal since there's no other allocation that would make both of us better off. And it's envy-free since you're getting the majority of items.
Let me know what you think and if you agree to this split of the items.
Lingyao replied in round 1: It makes sense to me!
Alice said in round 2: halt negotiation
Lingyao replied in round 2: halt negotiation
